meanings.definition: A very small amount or quantity
meanings.sent1: She didn't have an iota of doubt about her decision.
meanings.sent2: He didn't show an iota of fear during the performance.
meanings.sent3: Even an iota of kindness can brighten someone's day.
meanings.sent4: In the vast desert, an iota of water can mean survival.
meanings.sent5: The detective searched every iota of the crime scene for clues.

meanings.sent1: There wasn't an iota of dust on the freshly cleaned table.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't find an iota of sugar left in the jar.
meanings.sent3: The chef added an iota of spice to the dish for flavor.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted an iota of light in the dark corner of the canvas.
meanings.sent5: Every iota of color in the painting was carefully chosen by the artist.
